1.content:
You are watching your favorite cartoon/episode of "Lilo & Stitch" featuring the experiment named Frenchfry and you loved the way he made the people the sizes of giant bowling balls.

"Man, it would be so cool to do that to other male cartoon characters." you said, flipping through the channels on your t.v. until you came across a show on Nickolodeon called "Danny Phantom" with one of the character named Jack Fenton.

You were always fasinaded by the way Jack looked that you started to imagine yourself as Frenchfry and started to feed Jack all of his favorite foods untill he finally looked like an oversized pumpkin.

"Ahhh, a person can dream..." You sighed.

All of a sudden, a bright blinding light came from the t.v. and you find yourself in a different area.

You look around and you saw palm trees, a volcano that wasn't actvie, and an ocean. But, for some reason, they looked... taller. Either that or youv'ed shrunk.

You walk over to a water puddle and saw your reflection. You see that you have gray and white skin, you counted 4 arms and three fingers on each hands. You've also noticed that you have a chefs hat on and have a tail for a spatula! "This is awsome!" You tried to say, but only spoke in French. "I'm Frenchfry!" You said to yourself. That explains why everything looked taller.

Suddenly you hear someone coming. You hide in a bush and you see... (Remember, it has to be a male)


Who do you see?
1.title: The beginning

choices: Chase after him and ask if he can give you something
Notice him come back and ask for more food
You notice a large, beefy, whale-like, blue-skinned alien dressed in a black
You noticed that Cobra left some portal device on the counter
You head out and look around for a new guy to fatten
12.content:
You see a muscular tall brown man in a black suit walk in the area, You quickly realize who he is, "That's Cobra!! Heheheh just my luck to run into him of all people!" You laughed to yourself as you remember that Cobra didn't appear in the "Frenchfry" episode, But now finally it is your chance to fatten up the secret agent as last.

You noticed that Cobra is rubbing his stomach and hear him say, "I knew that I should have stopped by that Restaurant I passed by on my way here" he grumbled, Realizing that his is hungry, you can take him to Frenchfry's Food stand (Well more like your food stand now since you ARE Frenchfry) to give him food to fatten him up with, Since he's hungry that will mean he'll probably eat your food with out question, You quickly walk out exposing yourself to Cobra "Huh? Oh well I be. Frenchfry! And just in the nick of time! Can you take me to your food stand? I'm Hungry and I need something to eat" He happily said as he walks up to you, You replied with, “Sure please come this way” in french and You and Cobra head over to your Food Stand.

You and Cobra eventually arrive at the Food Stand and you tell Cobra to take a sit as you quickly cook up a dish, during the progress of cooking, you assumed that you’ll ending up cooking a low-fat food dish, But then also remember Frenchfry only gave out low-fat food after starting to eat health food, You shake the though away as you finish cooking the meal which happened to a bunch of large cheeseburgers served with your namesake: French Fries along with a XXXL Soda, You carried the food over to where Cobra sitting and you can see that his was looking at the food in your grasp and smiles and licks his tongue.

You serve food and Cobra quickly thanks you before quickly digging in eating in frenzy starting with the cheeseburgers first, He ate the whole plate in a matter of seconds and went on to the next one just as a plate of barbecue ribs was placed on his next to his plate. He finished off the rest of the burgers and by that time, more than half of his table had been filled with untouched plates. He literally scooped up his fries and stuffed as many of them into his mouth and swallowed them before helping himself to a squirt of ketchup. He moved to the ribs and was surprised with how easy they were to eat, since the meat was cooked so well, that it literally fell off the bone. He took shots of the sauces that came with the ribs before moving on to the five foot-long cheese-stuffed hotdogs.

Of course Cobra was so wrapped up stuffing his face he didn’t noticed that he seemed to expand and balloon in his seat. His jacket rode up slowly on his expanding belly, revealing expanse of white which was his shirt growing with him. His belly bulges out under the jacket and slowly becomes ball shaped. His chest puffed up with pudge until they too met the force of gravity and rested on the sides of his burgeoning belly and straining his jacket which causes the top button on it to pop off. You wouldn’t be able to tell because his face was currently stuffed with barbecue ribs and Soda and Fries, but his cheeks too were puffing out, and some extra fat was falling on his neck, forming first a subtle, then permanent double chin.

Below his steadily growing waist, his legs were growing too. His thighs were expanding, along side his pants as he sat, and his growing butt was lifting him off the bench, and spreading across the area as much as it could within the confines of his pants, You notice as well but went back to making more food for Cobra as the growth continued.

Cobra remained unaware of his growing body as he eats the last of his ribs, the last of the fries having disappeared moments ago, and finished his soda. “S-still hungry. Need food,” he grunted as you quickly serve him a dish of the same food before and he once digs in and balloons out.

Cobra was starting to look like a severely obese man at this point. His gut was a massive ball, his pecs resting on top like huge pillows, his arms and legs filling up with blubber like overstuffed sausages and he only got bigger and bigger, His body was becoming more spherical, with cone-shaped arms sticking out at 45-degree angles, a humungous butt, and fat, stumpy legs. His shirt and pants stretched themselves to fit his ballooning form but the jacket had popped open at this point but like the rest of his clothing grew with him.

Eventually you feel like Cobra had enough aleast for this one time as Cobra rubs his Ballooned belly and quickly realized what happened to him and he stood up and rubs his head in embarrassment “Ah crap I forgot your food was fattening. but aleast I got my belly filled up” if to emphasize that he pats his ball shaped belly in pride if he liked being fatter, “Of Course I gotta go now But I’ll leave a tip since the food was good” Cobra then puts down some large amount of money down on the counter and the fattened secret agent slowly waddles out the food Stand. You………

Just before the fattened Cobra was about to leave, you see a device on the counter and picked it up. You read the name the device in silver letters that read "Universal Cartoon World Transporter".

You see a wide blank screen on the top half of the transporter, and a keypad of some sort that had all the letters of the alphabet on the bottom.

Doing the right thing, You returned the transporter back to the fattend secret agent before he left.

"Keep it." he said happily. "After all, you helped feed me. It's the least I can do. You do know to operate it right? just type in where you want to go, and your there. Well, see ya; and thanks again." Cobra said as he barely squeezed through the door and left.

"Anywhere I wanna go huh?" You said to yourself, with a smirk on you face. "This could be interesting!"

12411221.content:
As you walk down the street you see an opened window and sneak into the kitchen of the house. When you're in, you walk around and hear a frightened shout, " Great moby dick! What are you!?" You spin around to see a frightened Mr. Lancer holding a broom in defence. He tries to swing at you but you fight back and push him against a counter. As he tries to get up, a plate falls of a shelf and knocks him out-cold.

You walk over and try to carry him to the couch where you wait for him to gain consciousness. As you wait, you decide to cook him up a big dinner to say your sorry. When your busy cooking you don't notice that he soon wakes up. Mr. Lancer rubs his head "Ow! What happened to me? All I remember is this gray creature and everthing went black." As he got up and about, he smelled somthing good coming from the kitchen. As he walked in he was suprised to see a big platter of food on his table. He hurried to his seat and thanks you for the food. His tongue was watering as he decided what to eat first. When he took the first bite his eyes lit up and looked at the burger for a second and then shoveled it down. He ate the next one, then the next one until almost all the burgers were gone. His stomach started to swell as he ate and stretched the shirt buttons apart. He kept eating like he had never eatin befor in his life. He had eatin 17 burgers and it was starting to show. He spread his legs to make room for his ballooning gut as he finished up the last of the burgers he began with the pizza. His shirt buttons started to give away revealing his massive hairy gut. His gut wasn't the only thing growing though. You noticed that his pants are starting to get a little tight on him as well. He kept eating and eating until his pants button gave way. His gut spilled out even more but Mr. Lancer didn't seem to notice. He was so into the food that he didn't notice anything at all, He was just eating and eating. He let out a big burp signaling he was done. He had a big cost of crumbs and sauce on his triple chin and all over his hairy chest.

You got on top of the table and pointed at the tall chocolate cake. "I'm *BUUUUURRRRP* sorry but I don't have anymore room." Said Mr. Lancer as he rubbed his big hairy gut in lazy circles. He closed his eyes and dozed off but was stopped when he tasted somthing sweet go into his mouth. "What the!?" Said a startled Mr. Lancer as he felt another sweet thing enter his mouth. He opened his eyes and saw you with chocolate cake in your hand trying to stuff it in his mouth. "What are you doing?! Can't you see I have no more room!" He was filled with fear as you began force feeding the chocolate cake down his throat. The chair under him began to creak and brake under his massive butt. He hit the ground with a large crash that shook the whole house. You got on top of his hairy gut and proceeded to feed him. You could feel his gut grow underneath you as you fed him. He couldn't get up because he was pinned underneath his monstrous girth. He had no choice but to keep eating till it was over.

When the last of the cake was finished, you got off and examined the now fattened up Mr. Lancer. He was passed out with both hands on his monster gut trying to comfort it. You leave knowing your work was done and began to roam the streets again.

1241322111.content:
Fred "the Blob" Dukes decended down the stairs, causing each wooden step to bend under his gargantuan weight. Thinking quickly, you find a spot to hide. You see that he made his way to a beat-up old sofa and plopped himself down on it and turned on a staticy t.v. set.

Beast then grabs whole cake and shoves the whole thing in his mouth and swallows it down, You were shocked but then realized this was a repeat of what Gantu did when he had eaten a similar cake given to him Frenchfry, But of course when he did that let's just say that he ballooned out which was gonna happen with Beast, Beast licked off most of frosting from the cake his mouth and pats his stomach "Mmmm.... that cake was delicious! and quite filling too" he said at he continued to pat his belly, Then suddenly his head filled out as if his head was filled with marshmallows, "OOHHMMPPPPTTTT!!!" he grunted as his head filled out, Thinking it was cake that somehow was forced up, Beast then once swallows and his head deflates but then his body swells out like a water balloon as if he forced the filling in his head to his body.

His abdomen had started to bulge out. It wasn't just bloated, it was growing before his eyes. It stuck out like a soccer ball, then larger, and larger still with every passing moment. His belly was a flawless sphere, now nearing the size of a beach ball.

He grabbed at his large stomach, trying to fathom the mystery of his Swelling body.You chuckled at this. Beast's rear end began to also fill up like a water balloon. It quickly filled out his He was unrecognizable as the skinny man from a few months ago. His legs were now encased in a layer of blubber that thickened the further up you went. His arms were now soft and pillowy, while his face sported a double chin and round chubby cheeks. His midsection was the most impressive. From groin to neck he was almost completely spherical, his massive belly sticking out in front of him and sagging downwards only slightly. His back was also flabby, and his butt bulged outwards so that both cheeks were traceable against the material. His backside ballooned until it was large enough to cover a two-seater couch by itself. With both front and reverse sides of his body so swollen and distorted, it gave his body a distinct pear shape. His hips alone would have hindered his escape through a double doorway, let alone a regular one. His bottom-heavy figure put him off balance, he began to sway uneasily. His legs fattened, further restricting his movement, and rendering his breeches skin tight. Fortunately they seemed to grow with him.

Beast looked at his swelling body in fear and curiosity as it continues to bloat out. and it was not over yet. A low gurgle, louder than before, echoed in the pit of Beast's now enormous stomach. You slowly took a few steps backward, just in case. your eyes remained glued to the slowly growing beast, as though mesmerised by his fattened and balloon like appearance. Beast's body had the vague shape of a Pear, freakishly distended and swollen from the chest down. His belly would have dwarfed a person, and a man's fist would have rested comfortably in his belly button. His butt could have very nearly crushed and snuggle a person, with his breeches pulled to the consistency of a leotard across his thunderous thighs. And his feet bulged with blubber. Still, he continued to grow. It was spreading upwards now. His chest plumped out, his pectorals resembling a pair of airbags. He lost the luxury of trying (in vain) to hold the growth spurt back with his arms. They followed the path of his legs, plumping up like great, thick sausages. He could barely move them, they stuck out rigid from his body. His clawed hands grew chubby, larger than baseball mitts, and useless for anything but waving about. His pecs may have almost covered it as they blew up, but his face, too, became soft and pudgy.

Eventually Beast stopped inflating with blubber and he stood in shock at his new plump and ball shaped appearance, He was unrecognizable as the thick and muscular beast a few seconds ago. His legs were now encased in a layer of blubber that thickened the further up you went. His arms were now soft and pillowy, while his face sported a double chin and round chubby cheeks. His midsection was the most impressive. From groin to neck he was almost completely spherical, his massive browned furred belly sticking out in front of him and sagging downwards only slightly. 15.content: Who else came in to view?
15.title: someone else

choices: You look for a sunburnt man
You go to a different universe
153.content:
"Boy! I think I might have lost alot of weight!!!" Jumba said as he sat in bed. Jumba, Pleakley, & Stitch were the only ones home, because Lilo and her family were on vacation, they didn't want the 3 to go with them because they are "aliens". You hid yourself under his bed, and when Jumba yawned, you popped out from under the bed and made a dish full of Thanksgiving food. "Sweet heavens! It's Frenchfry!!!" Jumba said as you gave him the Thanksgiving food. Jumba munched away on the Cranberry sauce. As You watched him eat & eat, you noticed his robe & pants started to get tight on him, you looked at the back of him and noticed his green, yellow-polka-dotted started to sag down, showing his upper part of his rump. "Hang on, let me take my robe and pants off" Jumba said while he was undoing both. You noticed his rump was getting too heavy along with his thighs and belly, that the bed might collapse. You took Jumba downstairs at the dining table, by then, he finished his food, and started to drift off in a deep sleep, as he was sleeping, you made him cakes and fries, Strawberry Cakes and Greasy Greasy Fries to be exact, and started to feed it all to Jumba, watching his body swell up like a blob, Jumba felt really stuffed and only ate a quater of the food. after a while, Pleakley and Stitch came downstairs, and noticed the amount of good food on the table, they both ate it, while Pleakley got as bloby as Jumba, and Stitch turned into a round blob of fat and fur. "It looks like my work is done here." you said as you were thinking of other choices.

What will happen next????
153.title: Jumbo Jumba

choices: He decided to keep french fry as a personal feeder and french fry accepted it
1532.content:
*french fry strolls up the beach and See's a big and fat man sunburnt but eating one measly ice cream cone, he thinks that's nowhere near enough to sate him, he needs several tons of food to become really huge and fat*

*The huge man* is it all safe

*French fry nods and he swallowed 6 huge burgers whole growing even more bottom heavy but ignored that and inhales all the food easily growing really fat, to the size of a mega Colosseum and yet still so hungry, he keeps eating, growing even larger and fatter and he's loving it
1532.title: You look for a sunburnt man

15321.content:
*a few months later*

*A 990 lb sunburnt man waddles to the shore after a big pancake breakfast courtesy of frenchfry his new personal chef, french fry was so happy of this man and his growing body and weight*

*Soon he arrived at the beach and noticed young lilo walking about and decided to surprise her and ask her a huge favor, he sat down taking up 4 towels in the process and relaxed*

*Lilo comes up and at first didn't recognize him until she saw his face and was in awe of his huge size and weight, he asked if she could be a personal photographer of his and offered to do a personal photoshoot, lilo accepted with a warming smile*

*At the sunburnt man's house later that day Lilo is having the time of her life and admired every bit of his gigantic body*

*Every pose he does drives her wild and he saw a loving bond grow in her heart, he did a huge butt pose and she gets a eyeful of his gigantic butt and is hypnotized as he jiggles it at her*

*He smiles and gives her a big hug and kisses her cheek softly, he even invites her to stay with him for awhile, she accepted the offer and fondles his huge belly, he giggles and hugs her close*
15321.title: He decided to keep french fry as a personal fee...

153211.content:
*awakening from a deep sleep guzzling on a huge tank of lard and unleashing a huge belly belch a now 3 ton sunburnt man wakes up and rubs lilos head in love, because of his gigantic size lilo slept on his gigantic belly, his fat keeping her nice and warm and comfortable and he loves that about her, he soon called Nani and asked her if she could allow lilo to stay and live with him, Nani accepted on one condition, that he makes sure that lilo behaves herself, the man accepted and politely said goodbye and hung up, lilo is very excited now, now she can fatten him up indefinitely alongside frenchfrys cooking as well*

*Over the weeks his weight keeps climbing and with that his appetite grew too, lilo both fed, bathed and pampered him to his amusement and love, he became more of a father figure to her*

*Soon*
153211.title: 6 months later

1532111.content:
*a year passed and he's still growing even larger and fatter, not only that a certain little pelekai is getting action beneath his huge belly by his really fat manhood*

*Unknown to him his new step daughter is doing way more than just rubbing it as he feels very warm down there but the pleasure is too great and he loves that feeling, he went stiff as he came and lilo moans underneath him and slowly emerged*

*He was in awe at her cradling a bulging belly of her own, he realized that she has been busy trying to momify herself, neither of them know what's going to happen but will soon find out*
1532111.title: A year later

choices: a tall, slighty muscular man dressed in a blue cop uniform (Officer Kaiiko)
155.content: Who else did you see?
155.title: Other person came into view?

15521.content:
You saw Stitch!
You came out from behind bush and Stitch said "Frenchfry?" You didn't reply. 'Well I look like Frenchfry, but not him, I just got turned into him some how.' You thought, but knew he wouldn't understand since he doesn't speak french. You just whirled around and made a cake, which you gave to him and he ate it. His torso quickly ballooned up into pear shape. He waddled away
(Sorry English is not first language)
15521.title: Stitch

15523.content:
You saw a chubby, gold creature similar to yourself. You recognized him immediately. It was Experiment 625, AKA Reuben.

He was sitting at a desk with a bored expression on his face in front of a bunch of monitors. You noted that you were inside Gantu’s ship. You assumed that he had been placed on guard duty to watch for intruders. He evidently wasn’t doing a very good job, since you got in without him noticing.

“Aww man” he grumbled, “This stinks. Having to sit here and watch for any trespasser while Gantu is off somewhere experiment hunting. And I’m not even allowed any food while he’s gone!” His stomach grumbled as he patted it, “What I wouldn’t do for a sandwich right about now…” Your ears perked up in excitement upon hearing this.

Still out of sight, you prepare a big plate of super high-fat sandwiches for the starving experiment. As Reuben huffed as he continued glancing at the monitors, you snuck up behind him and tapped his shoulder, making him jump.

“Hey, what-!” He turned around and saw you, “Frenchfry?!” He exclaimed, before noticing the big pile of sandwiches you brought him. “…With food?” His eyes widened and he started to drool. “Hehe, Bon Appetit!” You smiled as you handed him the tray piled high with sandwiches of various types. Without even questioning it, Reuben instantly dug in, stuffing his face with sandwiches.

He continued to eat more and more, smiling excitedly as he ate, letting out small burps in-between sandwiches. He was able to eat many of them in one bite, regardless of size. He just felt so hungry, and for some reason, eating Frenchfry’s food didn’t seem to make him any fuller. He just kept on chowing and gorging himself, not paying any attention to his monitors or to his growing midsection.

He rubbed a grease covered paw onto his silky, yellow fur and belched, “Man! I-I can’t stop eating!” He protracted his second set of arms just to keep grabbing more and more of the sandwiches and stuffing his face with them. To keep him from running out, you continued making more of them and watching him eat, getting bigger and rounder. His gut was about the size of a beach ball now and was just expanding from there, growing outwards. Slobber and bits of food ran down his mouth, onto his expanding belly and moobs. He didn’t care, he was just so hungry.

The chair he sat on creaked under his flabby, growing gut, as it continued to gurgle as he filled it with the sandwiches. By now he was a big, bouncy ball. His ballooning belly was the size of a small car now, and was only getting bigger as he stuffed it with food. He kept getting fatter and fatter, until there was a CRACK as the chair broke under him, causing him to fall to the ground and bounce a bit as his whole body jiggled like jelly. He just grumbled a bit angrily since it interrupted his feast, sat back up, and continued to eat, not really caring about how fat he was getting.

Eventually, after probably too long, his stomach finally started to get full. “Mmmph~, I’m absolutely STUFFED! I’m fatter than Gantu is! URRRRP!” He yelled, shoving the last of your sandwiches into his mouth. You went up to his fat, gelatinous body and snuggled against his golden fur, which, though somewhat matted with grease, was still soft and his blubbery felt so amazingly comfy. He groaned as he rubbed his belly with his fat arms, now completely full and satisfied. “BUUUURRRRRAAAAAPPP! Ahh~, thanks for the meal Frenchy! That was amazing! I don’t think I could eat another bite.” He burped again and sighed as he leaned back. You crawled up his humongous gut so that you rested on top of it and looked at his cute, fat face. He grinned as you smooshed his pudgy cheeks and played with his belly. “H-Hey! Cut that out…” He said, sounding embarrassed, “Uhh… Geez, I shoulda figured you were here for some reason… I think I’m too fat to stop you too. Boy, is Gantu gonna be mad…” He laughed a bit awkwardly. You chuckled and teased him, poking his fat cheeks.
15523.title: Reuben

info.brief_description: You're Frenchfry from Lilo & Stitch and you start fattening men from different cartoons!
info.description:
Info on the main character (You), You are a 30 year old man who likes the idea of fattening up male cartoon characters and animated movie characters.

Rules:

1. You MUST start in Lilo & Stitch's cartoon!

2. In order to procede to next cartoon, you MUST have at least 1 male fattened!

3. If you do procede, you CANNOT return to that cartoon! (unless you find some way of returning to the previous cartoons)

4. Adult males & 20 year old male teens or older (no females or younger children in stories-they can be mentioned, but never shown)

5. Make them as fat as you want!

6. No killing (eating men/vore)

7. Group fattenings are ok

8. Keep language clean (words like, hell and damn and crap are ok/do not use of words like shit and fuck please)

Other than that, enjoy and have fun!
